title: [POI John Reese/Jim Caviezel Fanvid] Everybody loves me
author: 李丹
comment: Jim Cavizel is the only American actor who would be a great James Bond.
It's kinda hard not to love this guy
so handsome and a genuine person. so James bond love it.
description:
BGM: Everybody loves me by One Republic
All about the Man in Suit.
Sources of classical comments for Jim Caviezel:
Michael Emerson: He doesn’t need  to have fashion sense.Coz 
he‘s one of those guys who look good when they rise up in the bed in the morning. ——Michael Emerson on extra
Jonah Nolan: It's amazing that Jim gets better-looking when you beat him up. Greg Plageman: I know! ——Producer commentary of Pilot
Enrico Colantoni: I think Elias wants to sleep with Jim! Oh god man I love Jim Caviezel! ——Podcast of Interest 081

I'm Dandan,
Comments are welcomed:)
